title: Implicit Interface Failure
body:
While working on #1073, I came across another issue:
```fortran
program main

integer, dimension(2, 4) :: a
integer :: b(2) = [10, 20]
integer :: m = 4, i, j, n = 2

do 20 j = 1, n
        do 10 i = 1, m
            a(j, i) = i*j
   10    continue
   20 continue

call driver(implicit_interface_check, a, b, a(1, m), n, m)


contains

subroutine driver(fnc, arr, b, c, n, m)
integer, intent(in) :: n, m, c, b(n), arr(n, m)
real :: x
x  = fnc(arr, n, m)
print *, x
end subroutine

real function implicit_interface_check(arr_e, n, m)
integer, intent(in) :: n, m, arr_e(n, m)
implicit_interface_check = 5.0
print *, arr_e(1, 2)
return
end function

end program
```

gfortran:
```
% gfortran a.f90 && ./a.out
           2
   5.00000000    
```

lfortran:
```
% lfortran a.f90 --implicit-typing --allow-implicit-interface --show-asr
ASR verify pass error: ASR verify: Var::m_v `fnc` cannot point outside of its symbol table
  --> a.f90:18:1 - 24:1
   |
18 |    subroutine driver(fnc, arr, b, c, n, m)
   |    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^...
...
   |
24 |    
   | ...^ failed here
```
